description: Main application source file for the Flutter furniture shopping app, defining app initialization, UI structure, and health check logic.

classes.name: FurnitureApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter app, setting theme and home screen.

classes.name: SplashGate
classes.description: Stateful widget that manages initial health check and navigation to main content or error screen.

classes.name: _SplashGateState
classes.description: State class for SplashGate, implementing health check logic and UI transitions.

classes.name: SplashScreen
classes.description: Screen displayed during app startup to indicate loading.

classes.name: ErrorScreen
classes.description: Displays error message when backend health check fails, with retry option.

classes.name: _HelpNote
classes.description: Small widget providing tips about backend URL configuration.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main navigation screen with bottom navigation and different pages.

classes.name: ProductsPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder for product listing, displaying a list of sample products.

classes.name: SettingsPage
classes.description: Page for app settings, currently indicating environment variable info.

classes.name: HelpPage
classes.description: Page displaying help instructions and current backend URL.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter app, loads environment variables, and runs the main widget.
